column4: I am getting soundcard errors.  How do I reinstall the soundcard drivers?
you cant if they are built into the kernel
might be a module and you can re-compile that, but why ?
card supported by the Linux kernel ?
just says there was a problem with soundcard, doesn't list specifics... I don't know if it supported or not.
did you run alsaconf to reconfigure sound card ?
sounds liek cardm ight not be supported, buy a new card for $10 !!
run it from a virtual terminal
sudo alsaconf says command not found
How do I run that, it says command not found.
alsaconf ? yeah it seems to be gone now a days, I used to use it heaps over the years
there must be something comparable to it now a days
